snippet.title: Ice Cream Pachinly Alpha Gameplay
snippet.description:
Pachinly Games is working on our first Steam release "Ice Cream Pachinly!" A top down 3D action game with 4 playable characters and voice acting! 
When an alien creates an evil circus that threatens to destroy humanity, two chef's and their guitar playing friend must embrace destiny, and save the world! 
Subscribe and click the bell to get notified once the Steam page and demo are are live, or follow us on X(formerly Twitter):  https://twitter.com/PachinlyGames
